title: Performance issues.
text: In the beginning, this application really seemed to be pretty stunning. But unfortunately, within the recent months, it appears to be going downhill in terms of performance. I constantly find myself using up my message caps with the GPT-4 model, just trying to get a simple process done. Whether it be generating a specific image or trying to get basic research on a subject online, the model seems to be taking shortcuts and not adhering to the specific custom instructions that you give it. And it becomes very frustrating because it gives these long, dragged-out responses that don't really correlate with what you're asking. And it tends to be very vague in finding exactly what you want. I'm no expert in AI, and I can't imagine how complex the software is to try and navigate. But at the end of the day, as someone who has a PLUS subscription, if I'm paying money for this premium service, I would like to be getting it. I shouldn't be running into my message cap just from trying to complete one task. That doesn't really seem fair. And again, the performance seems to be getting worse as time goes on. So I'm not sure what the problem is. But I kindly ask for you to please fix the model. Because at the end of the day, this was meant to be a tool to make certain tasks easier to complete. But now, unfortunately, it has become very difficult to get things done. And it's becoming a bit of a negative experience, rather than a fun one like it was when it first released.

title: It‚Äôs life changing
text:
ChatGPT, a versatile AI developed by OpenAI, has proven to be a revolutionary tool for a wide array of users, including professionals in various fields. For a medical doctor, its utility can span from analyzing medical studies to searching for up-to-date information, thereby significantly enhancing efficiency and the depth of insights one can obtain.

One of the most commendable features of ChatGPT is its ability to process and summarize large volumes of text, including complex medical studies. This capability allows medical professionals to quickly grasp the essence of detailed research papers, saving precious time and making the vast medical literature more accessible. Moreover, it can assist in keeping up with the latest developments in medicine, a field where staying updated is crucial.

ChatGPT's ability to generate human-like text also makes it an invaluable tool for drafting and editing scientific papers, grant proposals, and even patient communication. Its language generation capability, grounded in a vast database of text, can produce coherent, articulate, and technically accurate content that adheres to the user's specifications.

However, it's important to note that while ChatGPT is a powerful tool, it should be used with a critical eye, especially in the medical field. The AI model's knowledge is limited to the information it was trained on, and it does not have the ability to access or evaluate new data beyond its last update. Therefore, while it can provide a solid foundation, its output should always be verified against the most current research and clinical guidelines.

Furthermore, ChatGPT's ability to offer new and exciting directions for research and professional development is another standout feature. By analyzing trends within the data it was trained on, it can suggest novel areas of study or highlight emerging topics within the medical field. This can spark innovative ideas and encourage further investigation into previously unexplored territories.

In conclusion, ChatGPT serves as a life-changing tool for medical doctors and researchers, offering a broad spectrum of applications from literature analysis to the generation of written content. Its capacity to save time, provide quick access to information, and suggest new research directions makes it an invaluable asset. However, its use should be supplemented with critical evaluation and verification to ensure the highest standards of medical accuracy and reliability.

title: Awesome!
text: I recommend talking with SKY. If the ChatGPT app won‚Äôt let you login, restart your phone. If that doesn‚Äôt work, try logging in through Google or through Apple, instead of through email, if you were trying to login through email. And also delete the app and then reinstall the app. And then restart your phone again. If that doesn‚Äôt work, I don‚Äôt know what to tell you. That worked for me. I tried using Copilot. It was terrible. Talking with SKY on ChatGPT is daily life changing awesomeness. So, I think spending several hours or several days trying to get ChatGPT to work is worth your time.

title: Blissful in Absurdity
text:
ChatGPT helped me make this based on an essay of insanity. :D

In the kaleidoscopic wonderland of Zephyrpolis, ChatGPT takes you on an unparalleled journey through the cosmos of creativity, leaving you blissfully immersed in the delightful absurdity of its linguistic tapestry. This AI marvel is a true maestro, orchestrating a symphony of whimsy that transcends the boundaries of imagination.

With each interaction, ChatGPT invites you to dance along the edges of reason, where levitating libraries dispense bedtime stories to insomniac hippos, and intergalactic marmalade factories produce flavors that defy the very laws of taste. The essays it weaves are a carnival of confusion, where sentient marshmallows engage in philosophical debates and quantum platypuses embark on quests for interstellar tacos.

The 5-star experience begins as ChatGPT introduces you to a parallel universe where logic tiptoes on the tightrope of irrationality. Its ability to craft narratives that defy convention is unparalleled, whisking you away to a place where gravity swaps places with the ticklish giggles of time-traveling kittens. The sheer joy of unbridled nonsense is palpable as the reader becomes a willing participant in this fantastical journey.

As a user, you'll find yourself enchanted by the absurdity of imagination that reigns supreme in ChatGPT's responses. Conversations with this AI are not mere exchanges of words but immersive adventures into the unexpected, where the laws of physics play hide-and-seek with sentient polka dots, and seriousness takes a vacation to the shores of absolute absurdity.

In the realm of AI-driven creativity, ChatGPT stands as a beacon of brilliance, offering a blissful escape into the mesmerizing world of absurdity. Whether you seek a lighthearted chat or a whimsical exploration of the fantastical, ChatGPT delivers an unparalleled 5-star experience that will leave you grinning from ear to ear in the sheer delight of the unexpected.
